----- TO DO:
fancy up css & layout
ask amanda to make you a nice header + picture
quickstart: http://jekyllrb.com/docs/quickstart/ (for local host + dev)

make auto-post on date (so that only posts dated to post that day will post, not future posts)
make clickable calendar of months w/ a list of each month's post upon load of that month

----- info:
to run on local host: jekyll serve --baseurl '' --incremental (remove --incremental if problematic)
run locally from gh-pages branch - no need for master (push from gh-pages branch)
http://katdob.github.io/blog_paperclip/ is url, cannot be only http://katdob.github.io/ because is a Project Site
To add new content move from the post from _futureposts to _posts
Gandi sends masks katdob.github.io/blog_paperclip/ as katdob.com, so no need for custom DNS

----- misc resources:
youtubePlayer.html comes from http://www.adamwadeharris.com/how-to-easily-embed-youtube-videos-in-jekyll-sites-without-a-plugin/ --
paginate guide is here http://www.ericlagergren.com/blog/jekyll-pagination/
Gandi is here http://spector.io/how-to-set-up-github-pages-with-a-custom-domain-on-gandi/

----- post template:
---
layout: post
title:  ""
date: 0000-00-00 12:00:00
categories:
---
{% include youtubePlayer.html id="" %}
